Custom success page:
Use the variable %order-number% in the static block to output the order number.
Please add the variable %additional-info-html% to your static content to output the content of third-party extensions.
Use the Variable %registration-block% to output the registration block.
Individuelle Success-Seite:

Benutzen Sie die Variable %registration-block% um den Registrierungsblock auszugeben.
